title: Left handed gamer/ Southpaw
body:
Anyone here left handed?????

I write with left and throw balls with right...

Reckon transferring to left hand mouse will do me greats..?

replies.body:
I'm left handed :) 

I've never used a left handed mouse so i'm not entirely sure.
You'd essentially have to retrain yourself to use the new set-up, which IMO would be pretty hard as i'm assuming you've been using a right handed mice the whole time.

I'm right handed (naturally), but I use my left hand so much that I'm basically ambidextrous (20 years of playing guitar).

I have played games using alternate hands for movement and actions (emulated arcade games with  keyboard), I really don't notice a difference.
I also play guitar, but I play like a right handed person would, so um, rock on.

I'm also a lefty, mouse in right hand though.

{{summoner:14}} {{summoner:11}}

As a left hander myself, I always thought about this. I think ultimately it might help a little due to the fine motor skills you get from handwriting but it's too much effort. Give it a go if you like, i'd like to hear what happens.
